title: Lagging in my specific Account ONLY!!!!
body: My account recently is lagging a lot, but it only happen on this specific account, when i change to another account of one of my friends, it runs perfectly fine. I have been having this problem for weeks, is there anything that could be done to reset something or to stop this lagging business, my router is perfectly fine, and other accounts runs fine, it only happens on this account, even though i Repair the client, still only lags on this specific account only.

replies.body:
You might have an unstable connection, and noticing difference between difference accounts may just be a coincidance.  You should run through the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities and fix whatever might be causing issues with your network reaching the game server.

I also hate to be that guy, but I should also let you know that we don't support account sharing.  Feel free to have alternate accounts that you own, but for the security and integrity of another players account, you should refrain from using another player's account.  

I hope that helps!
